name: Use Semantic Color Tokens
description: Components should use semantic color tokens (--ks-text-color-*, --ks-background-color-*, --ks-border-color-*) rather than raw primitive color tokens (--ks-color-*). The primitive layer is for building the semantic layer, not for direct use in components.
rule: Direct references to --ks-color-* tokens (e.g., --ks-color-primary-alpha-5, --ks-color-fg-to-bg-3) in component tokens bypass the semantic layer. Use the appropriate semantic token instead.
exceptions: The --ks-color-transparent token is acceptable for explicit transparency
Calculated values using primitives may be acceptable when no semantic token covers the use case
